record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3335
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3335 -- (Senate - July 25, 2008)

[Page: S7485]

speaking.paragraph: I understand that S. 3335 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3335) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
